Title: Yumekuri
Description:
['The story revolves around Yukami Makoto, a high school boy whose hobby is visiting hot springs. His 100th hot spring visit is at Miyama-kan, an inn run by four poster girls: Tokura, Akino, Tsutsuji and Mitomo. There, Makoto spies Yuri, a goddess of the hot springs, and unexpectedly usurps her powers. Makoto ends up working at the inn. ', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN) ']
Characters: ['Rokuya, Mitomo', 'Ushiki, Tokura', 'Shirahane, Yuri', 'Mikogai, Akino', 'Yukami, Makoto', 'Tounosawa, Tsutsuji']
Voices: ['Itou, Kanae', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Satou, Satomi', 'Kanemoto, Hisako', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Oogame, Asuka']
Staff: [['Hata, Hiroyuki', 'Director, Storyboard'], ['Aketagawa, Jin', 'Sound Director'], ['Amemiya, Hitomi', 'Script'], ['Hiro', 'Original Creator']]
